serviceName: Complete exams, x-rays, and dental cleanings
description: A root canal filling is a way of keeping a tooth, once the live part (the pulp) has become irreversibly damaged. The pulp is a mixture of nerve fibres and tiny blood vessels that can become very inflamed (giving tooth ache) or die off (causing an abscess).
It is important to discuss your dental cleaning options with your dentist, and having an understanding of the different types can be useful.

serviceName: Cosmetic dentistry, such as whitening, porcelain and composite veneers

description: It is important to discuss your dental cleaning options with your dentist, and having an understanding of the different types can be useful.
